item.title: SECedu CTF
item.description: Geegle Summit 2020! It was a web challenge where I needed to be root to get the flag. From the homepage of the website, it is understood that I need to upload a QR code and the website would scan it. Meanwhile, “ENTER GUEST AND HOST NAMES” didnt lead to any where. When I checked round, I figured out robots.txt contains a link /test/qrgen which leds to a page creating QR code by giving input.
